Title: Cyberwoman
Plot: Ianto Jones hides a very big secret at Torchwood - his half-converted girlfriend from the Canary Wharf Battle - down in the basement. He is quick to hire a Japanese doctor who believes he can "cure" her. But things soon go wrong, and the Cyberwoman's destructive powers are released to the whole of Torchwood. Upgrading is compulsary.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language
GuestStars: Bethan Walker, Togo Igawa, Caroline Chikezie
